mapper.select: SELECT date_format(start_time,'%Y%m%d') FROM seat_use su WHERE mb_id=#{param1} ORDER BY use_id DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seat_use(mb_id, seat_no, end_time) VALUES(#{param1},#{param2},adddate(now(),interval #{param3} minute))
